name: Super Block
description:
You are a master thief who was sent on a mission to steal all of the jewels from Larry Leonardo Love-lock's mansion! You were able to get inside successfully but oh no! You tripped a silent alarm and now the guards are after you! Thankfully you are equipped with the latest in time warping tech you are able to slow down time based on your moments allowing you to think out plans while not have to worry about being chased down!

Your goal is to Steal the Diamond before the guards catch you!

"Super Block" is a 2D game where the player takes on the role of a character who must steal the jewel without the guard(s) catching them. The game is set in a retro arcade machine with minimal graphics.

The game-play is inspired by the popular game "Super Hot", and time only moves when the player moves, adding an extra layer of strategy to the game. The yellow enemy moves will move faster or slower than the player depending on the players speed and acceleration.

The player must use their wits to find ways around the enemy by trapping, louring, and tricking the enemy.

As the player progresses through the game, the levels become increasingly difficult, with new enemy variants and level design choices.

The game's visuals and sound effects are minimalist, with a simple color palette but a chaotic sound-track. The game's goal is to test the player's agility and strategy, with fast-paced, challenging game-play that can be slightly rage inducing.

Overall, "Super Block" is a fun and challenging 2D game that is perfect for players who enjoy fast-paced, action-packed game-play and want to test their skills and reflexes in a game that requires quick thinking and good timing.

Press "R" to restart a run

Press "SPACE" to go to the next level after a level was completed

Press "SHIFT" to slow -Yourself- down

Thank you MangoWorks for the music! Sorry we couldn't finish our game together for this jam.
